section.p: To renounce the worship of Elnir, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation. A passing noble says disdainfully, ‘Ha! Only those born to rule have the fibre to worship the Sky Lord. Those who renounce Elnir never reach the top!’

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 40 Shards and delete Elnir
from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
